```c
struct A {
  int a;
  float b;
}

int c;

void fun(int d, int f) {
  int h;
  float g;
  A stru;
  int [d + 1][f * 2] array;
  h = 0;
  g = 2.0;
  stru.a = -1;
  if (a == 0) {
    h = 1;
  } else {
    while (h > 0) {
    	g++;
      break;
      continue;
    }
  }
  return 0;
}
```
